item.description:
Saturday, Jan. 12, 8 p.m. (doors open at 7:30) - Bellevue Cadillac is
celebrating its 15th year playing around the world. You've heard
Bellevue's music in major motion pictures like
Shallow Hal, as well as TV shows such as The Sopranos,
Las Vegas, Ed, Sex and the City, Touched by an Angel,
Brimstone, and Good and Evil. Bellevue Cadillac has
been featured on Access Hollywood, CNN Showbiz,
Hard Copy, and VH1 and has been recognized by
Rolling Stone Magazine and People Magazine.
To top if off, the band received 7 nominations
from the National Academy of Recording Artists
for the 2007 Grammy Awards for record of the year,
album of the year, and song of the year. Don?t
miss your chance to see this accomplished band
live at the PCA in Westford!

This information was forwarded to me by one of our members. I will not be attending but interested members can get a group together by emailing those who respond yes. Sounds like a fun time. Also...PCA events are cabaret-style seating which means byob and appetizers.
Reserve a table for 4 or more! Tickets $15 members/$18 non-members.

To purchase tickets, call the PCA at 978-692-6333 or
visit http://www.westford.c...

For further info on Bellevue Cadillac, visit their website at:
http://www.bellevueca...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Bellevue Cadillac - 7 Grammy Award Nominations!
